title: Blest Is He Who Is Righteous

verses.html:
1
Blest is he who ne’er consents
In the wicked’s way to walk,
Neither stands in sinner’s ways,
Nor with the scoffer’s talk.

2
But he makes the law of God
His comfort and his delight,
So he reads therein by day,
And meditates by night.

3
Like a fair tree fed by streams,
That with timely fruit doth bend,
He shall flourish, and success
All his designs attend.
